post.content:
Our first football game is behind us and WOW! what an exciting evening!

We Need Volunteers!

We are VERY SHORT on volunteers for:

  • AIR SHOW Call Gary -- 440-915-1178
  • CONCESSIONS Call Dawn – 216-990-0271
  • 50/50 RAFFLE Call Elisa – 216-407-5625

LINKS you need to know:

  • Mr. Vitale’s Website
  • Band Booster’s Website
  • FaceBook North Royalton Band Boosters -- Like Us!!
  • Other Fundraisers: GFS and Smile.Amazon.com (see below)

DATES you need to know:

  • Aug 29 – Band Booster Meeting -- Media Center @7PM
  • Sept 2 – Football Game HOME
  • Sept 3-5 - Air Show (see below)
  • Sept 9 – Football game AWAY
  • Sept 10-11 – FRUIT SALE BLITZ!!

Air Show

Here is what we still need! We are getting closer:

  • Saturday – 9 more volunteers
  • Sunday – 10 more volunteers
  • Monday – 32 MORE volunteers

As you can see, we desperately need HELP on MONDAY! If we do not fill the spots, we may not be offered this fundraiser next year. Air Show has been with our Marching Band for more than 15 years. A tradition in our band family!

Please find the time to help us out… BRING CHAIRS, COOLERS AND ENJOY THE DAY. There are plenty of breaks for you to walk around and enjoy the show!

Here is the link to our signup form.

Contact: Gary Diehl 440-915-1178

50/50 Raffle: We Need Help!

If you signed up to work 50/50 on your registration form, please come and help us. Elisa was down almost HALF of her helpers for last Friday’s game.

All you have to do is talk to everyone coming in and sell the tickets. They actually sell themselves! CALL Elisa to let her know you are available to help.

Contact: Elisa Race -- 216-407-5625

Concessions: We Need Help!

We need you to help sell concessions at HOME football games AND Band Fest! The concessions team has a lot of fun and you will get to meet every hungry person in the stadium! Sign up here to volunteer.

Contact: Dawn Rembowski: 216-990-0271

Photo Buttons

Photo Buttons will be ready for pickup at the Sept 2 home game. Debbie has her table set up at the NORTH gate. Orders are still being taken too! Contact: Debbie Sexton – 440-785-7725

North Royalton Stadium Foundation Car Raffle

Marching Band sales for the car raffle will begin on Tuesday, August 23rd and will end September 30th. Everyone should now have their raffle tickets. Please remember to turn in your sold tickets and payments in your car raffle envelope and place it in the white band box.

Contact: Jane Coleman – 440-759-9864

Membership

Our membership drive is underway! JOIN the Band Boosters! There are many membership levels! Print the form at the bottom of this newsletter OR go to this page to get the form! Bring your completed form to Parent Preview Night or drop it in the White Band Box! Questions?

Contact: Shirley Berish – 440-667-0811

Other Fundraisers

GFS: If you shop at GFS, remember to mention North Royalton Band Boosters and Marching Band at checkout. We have an account there and accumulate $$$$ for everything YOU spend!

Smile.Amazon Are you an Amazon shopper? Set up a SMILE.AMAZON account and a percentage of what you purchase will be added to the North Royalton Band Booster account:

YOU can help North Royalton High School Band Boosters when you shop for back-to-school supplies and many other items that you purchase from Amazon! This link will help you set up your SMILE account!.

Support us when you shop for back-to-school items. #StartWithaSmile at http://smile.amazon.com/ch/34-1817202 and Amazon donates.
